title: Gold 2 Main Sup looking for Duo to Plat
body: Hey folks! I'm a support main (Gold 2). I'm looking to hit plat this season. 90% of the games I am in I play consistently, though at this elo I find it increasingly difficult to influence the game in such a way that can be truly game deciding or can "carry". Looking for someone who can play exceptionally well at this rank, preferably an adc, and help me climb into plat. This could be a player who was high plat or diamond last season and is now in high gold or low plat. Or someone on an alternate account works just as well. I main Sona, soraka, and braum. My weakest lanes are probably against any thresh that actually has skill. Active hours are from 5pm-9pm Pacific on weekdays, most of the day on Saturdays, and mornings on Sundays. I have curse and would love to use it. Add me IGN: Loony Russian

replies.body: Hey man its caleb from work
